parentProduct.title: Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Implementation Guide for Human Clinical Trials Version 2.0
Clinical Data Acquisition Standards Harmonization Implementation Guide for Human Clinical Trials Version 2.0

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor element for scenario field SC.DenormalizedExample.MARISTAT_SCORRES

sdtmigDatasetMappingTargets.title: Result or Finding in Original Units

fields.definition: Result of the [SCTEST] as originally received or collected.
fields.implementationNotes: Each test may be collected using the CDASH variable [TESTCD] (e.g., MARISTAT) or [TESTCD]_SCORRES where TESTCD is the appropriate CT for the SC test code e.g., MARISTAT_SCORRES. This CDASH variable name is an example of what "variable name" can be used in a denormalized data structure.
fields.label: Marital Status
fields.mappingInstructions: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable listed in the column with the heading "SDTMIG Target". In addition to the SDTMIG variable SCORRES, create the SDTMIG variable SCTESTCD from the CDASH variable name and determine the value of SCTEST from SCTESTCD. The CDASH prompt may also contain the SCTEST. Use appropriate CDISC Controlled Terminology for the test and test code.
fields.name: MARISTAT_SCORRES
fields.questionText: What is the subject's marital status?
